name: .GRS
summary: Learn about .GRS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a GRS file in Gravity Sketch (Windows, iOS). For example, you can place a GRS file in Gravity Sketch's Saved Sketches folder to be able to select it from the program's main menu.

If you want to import a GRS file into a new Gravity Sketch scene, you can do so by adding the file to Gravity Sketch's Import Library folder. You can then select the GRS file in Gravity Sketch's Import Models tool.

To export a GRS file as an OBJ, IGES, or FBX file, select the Export icon that appears in Gravity Sketch. You'll then be able to save your GRS file as an OBJ, IGES, or FBX file. By default, Gravity Sketch stores exported sketches in its Exported Sketches folder.
